website_summaries.verdict: A laser measuring device plus an app that consolidates the data you need in an instant.
pros: Hi-tech and easy to use for those comfortable with technology
Provides not just precise measurements but also estimates
The device synchronizes with compatible  applications that pull double duty in terms of feedback
Industry professionals can save time and money with this product
cons: Trusted by many, however technology may not  always provide a perfect result

customer_reviews.title: Worthless device
customer_reviews.text: The measurements are not accurate at all. This is OK for guess work and not as advertised. I thought I can make an accurate measurements for Production but it turned out it is only good if you want to give a quote and the details are not important.
customer_reviews.author: Nidal Kerdiya

customer_reviews.title: I have this boss who thinks I can measure like a pro
customer_reviews.text: Stanley thinks of everything. Including making my life a lot easier. See, I have this boss who thinks I can measure like a pro. Truthfully, me and numbers don't get along. This piece of equipment makes my life a hell of a lot easier! One picture of one of our properties and Bam! Dimmensions of every nook and cranny. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Pay attention to where the red ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Pay attention to where the red dot is and all your measurements will be fairly accurate. Mostly used for fast estimations.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Great device, if you need to do area/material calculations on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.text: Really great device. It does a lot of calculating for you, helps to plan out a job. However, I ended up returning the product only because I'm a homeowner, didn't need to do calculations on frequent enough basis. If you're a contractor, doing area calculations all the time, calculating materials needed for a job, etc., this will be a huge time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment
customer_reviews.text: This is the first kind of tool I have used like this. I really like it. Saves so much time and is easy to use. Worth the money. The cloud prices are high. If I was doing siding all the time maybe.
customer_reviews.author: mtcaveman

customer_reviews.title: The measurements weren't completely accurate but pretty close for estimating paint
customer_reviews.text: this is a neat idea...and it does work. The measurements weren't completely accurate but pretty close for estimating paint, etc. I think i would like it better if it was standalone with it's own camera and then synced via bluetooth to my phone. Having to tie up my phone is always an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This does not measure anything less than 8 feet. Not a very productive measuring tool
customer_reviews.author: K F

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't compatible with any of my 4 phones. I have not used it.
customer_reviews.author: charby5770

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. With my phone I need to forget it on Bluetooth and reconnect it every time I use it. But it saves me a lot of time and is spot on!
customer_reviews.author: bill7718

customer_reviews.title: Like any tool, you need to use it correctly
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. Very operator dependent, but accurate when used correctly. The one thing they need to fix is saving measurements. If you do a measurement then get bust without saving and lose connection you have redo the measurement process. Good value for cost
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for estimating
customer_reviews.text: Great tool once you get the hang of using it, it appears to be very accurate once you have it calibrated. The accuracy really depends on how accurately you put the lines superimposed on the photo.
customer_reviews.author: N Bailey

customer_reviews.title: This device is genious!!!
customer_reviews.text: The device is cool and works pretty well and precise enough! Very easy to use! I would be ideal to have a bag included to store it, but that's not a big deal. Just buy and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my Dad and my sons, works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my Dad and my sons, works pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Boomerdlinz

customer_reviews.title: Item looks good and I am sure it will function as intended
customer_reviews.text: Item looks good and I am sure it will function as intended, however no instructions on how to use with it and to date cant figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: No good at all way out on measurments don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, although a bit hard to understand the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: It is the future , buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: Using it in my siding business and I would say it is more accurate than doing with a tape measure. It is the future , buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great - accurate, simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A great product - simple and easy to use. Nothing else like it and measurements within the photo's are very accurate - I'm now measuring walls and buildings that used to be impossible to reach or measure. After downloading the app and attaching the laser it's important to align the laser (follow the instructions in the app) and after taking a picture of the object you want to measure, get the alignment rectangle correct in the photo. If you do that - it's extremely precise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsupported Hardware
customer_reviews.text: The customer support on behalf of Stanley is nonexistent. The software required to use this hardware on the PC is an expensive monthly subscription service, and all photos taken with the app have a watermark on them that make them completely unusable for any commercial application. Find a competing product if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expected better.
customer_reviews.text: Not very accurate. I've tried several times to synchronize the unit but to no avail. no a small house it can be off up to 3 feet on a 22 foot wall. I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Amaral

product_meta.title: Stanley STHT77366 Smart Measure Pro
product_meta.description: The STANLEY STHT77366 Smart Measure Pro; when time is money, save it with the Smart Measure. The STANLEY Smart Measure Pro is a tool and app that immediately provides accurate measurements of areas photographed in images taken on mobile devices. This time saving tool instantly provides correct dimensions and accurate estimations of how much material will be needed to complete a project. This tool offers Bluetooth connectivity with dedicated app, with IOS and Android connectivity. It offers an extended range of 450 ft., and an easy locking clamp. Includes: USB Cable, Quick Start.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars43 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
